titles: A new opera called Brutus of Alba, or, Augusta's triumph as it is acted at the theatre in Dorset-Garden, by His Majesty's servants.
author: Powell, George, 1658?-1714.
Purcell, Daniel, 1660?-1717.
Verbruggen, John, d. 1708?
Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715. Brutus of Alba.
publisher: Printed by W. Onley for Sam. Briscoe ...,
notes: Without the music by Purcell.  Cf. Grove, 5th ed.
Anonymous libretto published by George Powell and John Verbruggen to whom it is sometimes ascribed--NUC pre-1956 imprints.  Cf. aalso Nicoll, A.  A hist. of Eng. drama, 1660-1900, 1961, v. 1, p. 425.
Founded on the tragedy of the same name of Nahum Tate.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
